name: There's a Vector In My Sector
name_original: There's a Vector In My Sector
description:
There's a Vector in my Sector!

This is the second assignment as part of the Game Design and Development 1 course available through Coursera, by Michigan State University. You can learn more here:  Coursera - Game Design and Development with Unity 2020 Specialization

Assignment Description:

In this assignment, you will complete the 2D Shooter project. In part 1 of this assignment, you will follow along with a tutorial to create a 2D Shooter, and then in part 2, you will modify the game to transform it into your own.

What changed, EVERYTHING:

- There are 3 levels, each with bosses, when you get to level 3 it'll continue from level 1 and keep your score going. 

- I replaced and added my own enemies. The ones provided are kinda bosses now. 

- I replace the player sprite with my own and added a turret. 

- I made my own shaders using shader graph to get everything to glow. 

- Camera effects, bloom is used for the glow effect.

- I wrote a lot of code to change how enemies spawn. 

- I replaced and added sounds effects with royality free effects.

- I replaced the music with a royality free song. 

- I replaced all the menu graphics.
